Disclaimer: All Credit card and banking information is stored with Stripe and we are PCI compliant. For details, please check https://stripe.com/help/security

Stripe will stop automatically sending transfers and instead allow you to decide where and when to send them. (It may take a couple of days for your currently pending transfers to clear.)

This will enable paying out to other bank accounts (for example, contactors). There are some legal and product considerations you should think about before you start doing this in production. Let us know if you have any questions!

If you send transfers manually, you agree to the additional Terms of Service covering this feature.

After you turn on automatic transfers, we'll send you any remaining available balance and you'll no longer be able to send manual transfers.
